offlinechess

Class MoveRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • offlinechess.MoveRecorder

  • public class MoveRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that records the moves of a game

      • toMoveString

        public java.lang.String toMoveString(java.lang.String fromWhere,
                                     java.lang.String toWhere,
                                     int whichPiece,
                                     boolean capture)
        Determines a String that denotes a move
        Can be used for en passant captures as well
        Parameters:
        fromWhere - from where the piece is moved
        toWhere - to where the piece moved
        whichPiece - which piece moved
        capture - whether this piece is capturing something
        Returns:
        the String that denotes the move

      • toMoveStringF

                                      int column,
                                      int whichPiece,
                                      boolean capture)
        Determines a String that denotes a move
        Used when a move is ambiguous and the file or rank is needed for clarification
        Parameters:
        toWhere - to where the piece moved
        column - which file this piece is moved from
        whichPiece - which piece moved
        capture - whether this piece is capturing something
        Returns:
        the String that denotes the move

        after - the state of the game after the move
        fromWhere - from where the piece was moved
        toWhere - to where the piece was moved

      • moved

        public void moved(ChessBoard before,
                  ChessBoard after,
                  int fromWhereX,
                  int fromWhereY,
                  int toWhereX,
                  int toWhereY)
        Notifies this object of a move and notes it
        Parameters:
        before - the state of the game before the move
        after - the state of the game after the move
        fromWhereX - from which X position the piece was moved
        fromWhereY - from which Y position the piece was moved
        toWhereX - to which X position the piece was moved
        toWhereY - to which Y position the piece was moved

                                  ChessBoard after,
                                  boolean isWhite)
        Adds the check notation if the side is checked
        Parameters:
        move - the current move
        after - the state of the game after the move
        isWhite - whether the moved piece is white
        Returns:
        the finished move notation
